feed.title: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers Blog
feed.subtitle: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers Blog

entry.title: Introducing Emitbase ðŸ”¥
entry.summary: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers. It allows you to connect to a database, define the logic of alerts in SQL, and specify channels for alerts (Email or Slack).
entry.content: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers. It allows you to connect to a database, define the logic of alerts in SQL, and specify channels for alerts (Email or Slack).
